TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义中的列之间的映射实例的数据源和实例的目标表中的列。

span.span: Defines the mapping between a column in a instance's data source and a column in the instance's destination table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列映射定义数据源和目标表之间的映射。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定义映射 — 即集合为空 — 的列映射隐式基于序号位置。If mappings are not defined—that is, the collection is empty—the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 为实现此目的，必须匹配源和目标架构。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 如果未显示，将引发。If they do not, an will be thrown. 如果集合不为空、 不是每个数据源中存在的列必须进行指定。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 将忽略那些未映射的集合。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 您可以通过名称或序号引用源和目标列。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 此外可以混合按名称和相同的映射集合中的第几列引用。You can also mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数和每个目标列是在为其对应源列的相同序号位置中，列名称不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, and each destination column is in the same ordinal position as its corresponding source column, the column names do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Performing Bulk Copy Operations
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化新的默认构造函数对象。

span.span: Default constructor that initializes a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用此构造函数，然后必须定义映射使用的源属性或属性，并定义映射使用目标属性或属性。If you use this constructor, you must then define the source for the mapping using the property or the property, and define the destination for the mapping using the property or the property. ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建一个新的列映射，并使用列序号来引用的源和目标列。

span.span: Creates a new column mapping, using column ordinals to refer to source and destination columns.

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建基于列的序号位置的大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy based on the ordinal positions of the columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

member this.DestinationColumn : string with get, set

summary.span: 目标数据库表中要映射列的名称。

span.span: Name of the column being mapped in the destination database table.
The string value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 最后一个值设置优先。The last value set takes precedence. ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/VB/source.vb#1)]
